txt.en: Defeat the living fires of the Ghâshghurm.
A notice is pinned to the board:\n\n'Strange lights have been seen in part of Talath Úrui, on the burning rocks. A brave adventurer is needed to investigate these lights.'
Strange lights have been seen in part of Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should investigate these lights.
Strange lights have been seen in part of Talath Úrui.
Heat and fire begin to rise all around you!
You have defeated the living fires sent forth from the Ghâshghurm and protected those venturing into the burning plains of Talath Úrui.
